title: smara sadA mAnasa
sahitya:
smara sadA mAnasa bAlagOpAlam


anupallavi

  duritamaya dAruNa girikulisham


caraNam 1    yadukula tilakam yamijana vinutam parama gua vasatim vAridhi shayanam
    caraNam 2    sarasija nayanam sAmaja varadam madana janakamiha madhumura daLanam
    caraNam 3    garuDa turangam kanaka sucElamparama puruSam shrI pankaja nAbham
